parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking campaign finance and are mandatory for candidates' materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Valeriu Iftime, the president of PNL Botoșani.  It directly promotes the PNL party and urges voters to vote for "Echipa Valeriu Iftime," clearly identifying a specific parliamentary candidate and party. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Botoșani County and surrounding areas, as evidenced by the `aaa_info` section specifying numerous cities and counties. This is not a private communication; it's designed to reach a large number of people. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Valeriu Iftime and the PNL party in the parliamentary elections.  Phrases like "Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare," "Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva," and "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" explicitly aim to influence voting behavior. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it uses some elements of news reporting (mentioning a political figure's appeal), its core purpose is not objective information dissemination but rather partisan advocacy. It lacks the neutrality and balanced perspective expected of journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message from a political party leader. The call to action is direct and unambiguous.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>925633439092773</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334/2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PNL party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion. The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is also a violation of Article 98 t).
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Dorohoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 925633439092773) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează explicit candidatul Valeriu Iftime și Partidul Național Liberal (PNL), îndemnând cetățenii să voteze pentru acesta. Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 2.000 și 3.000 de impresii, cu o rază de acoperire de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane, în județele Botoșani, Iași și Suceava.  Fraze precum "Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare," "Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva," și "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" demonstrează clar intenția de a influența votul în favoarea PNL. Prezența numărului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Această acțiune constituie o încălcare flagrantă a legislației electorale, având în vedere că perioada de campanie electorală s-a încheiat.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt office@voceadorohoi.ro și +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
